pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exploration of Spatio-Temporal Data // A set of statistical tools for spatio-temporal data exploration. Includes simple plotting functions, covariance calculations and computations similar to principal component analysis for spatio-temporal data. Can use both dataframes and stars objects for all plots and computations. For more details refer 'Spatio-Temporal Statistics with R' (Christopher K. Wikle, Andrew Zammit- Mangion, Noel Cressie, 2019, ISBN:9781138711136).
